description:
Deseret Bookshelf is the incredibly simple way to read, search, and study your entire LDS library. This powerful app is the perfect companion for gospel learning, and a satisfying source of inspiration and doctrine that will last a lifetime.

Bookshelf from Deseret Book has been completely redesigned, making it simply the best LDS eBook reader available. When you get started you’ll receive eight free eBooks and find:

Quotes
● Perfect for when you have a spiritual thought or to help you begin your day right. 
● Thousands pre-loaded which you can find by Author, Topic, or Source
● Mark quotes as a favorite. Any quote you mark as a favorite will synchronize across all of your devices.
● Jump to the original source of the quote, if the book it is from is in your library; or if you don’t own the source you can learn more about it.
● Daily quote updates - Each day a new quote delivered to your device. You can set a reminder to let you know about the new quote either on a daily or weekly basis.

Better reading
● Normal, Night, and Sepia reading modes
● Customizable view (fonts, font size, line spacing)
● Page-view and scroll-view options
● Elegant, modern interface optimized for iOS 7

Enhanced study
● Tabbed reading allows you to easily switch between several open eBooks
● Easy access to your notes, highlights, and bookmarks
● All annotations backed up and accessible across your iOS devices

Search (faster and more powerful)
● Search your entire library or a single book
● Find exact phrases, any, or all search terms
● More accurate than ever before
● Easily switch between your library and search results

Social sharing
● Ability to share favorite passages with anyone through email, Facebook, and Twitter
● Option to tell your networks what books and authors you’re reading

Download the app and create an account to receive eight free classic LDS titles:

1) Jesus the Christ
2) Teachings of the Prophet Joseph Smith
3) Discourses of Brigham Young
4) Lectures on Faith
5) History of Joseph Smith by His Mother
6) The Miracle of Forgiveness
7) Gospel Doctrine
8) Autobiography of Parley P. Pratt

Plus the entire Standard Works: the Old and New Testaments, The Book of Mormon, Doctrine & Covenants, and Pearl of Great Price. LDS scripture references within eBooks are linked to the entire standard works, allowing you to easily explore scriptural connections within your library.

Shop our eBook store for nearly 3,000 LDS eBook titles and other world classics from your favorite authors. Download many official Church publications for free, including curriculum materials and reference books.

Need help? Try our FAQs: http://deseretbook.com/bookshelf_faq
Need more help? Email us at downloads@deseretbook.com
releaseNotes:
New Features

● Search all Deseret Book eBooks! Find titles, authors, subjects, and text matches from our catalog of over 3,000 eBooks, whether you own those books or not. If you don’t own the eBook you’ll see a preview of the search result with an option to learn more. Note: searching the entire eBook catalog requires an active Internet connection.
● Search suggestions: As you start to type a search phrase we will give you suggestions of titles, authors, or subjects that are possible matches of what you’re looking for.

Improvements

● Quick search: when you’re reading a book the quick search icon will show you search suggestions as well as even more matching on scripture references. For example, you can type in “Ne” and you will see 1st Nephi, 2nd Nephi, 3rd Nephi, 4th Nephi references you can immediately jump to.
● Study tools: instead of popping up over top the content, it slides from the left, giving you more control over accessing the tools as well as letting you see a preview of the book you’re reading smaller devices such as the iPhone.  You can simply swipe from the left of the screen to open the study tools.
● Improved graphics and support for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus devices.
● Much better compatibility with iOS 8.0.
● Adjusted the highlight intensity when in night mode making highlights easier to see.

Bug Fixes

● Fixed opening links in new tabs.
● Fixed bookmarks dragging/dropping to the correct location when running on iOS 8.0
● Fixed undocking the study tools when you jump to a bookmark on an iPad when your study tools are docked.
● Fixed a bug logging out could prevent you from logging back in.
● Fixed many bugs with iOS 8.0 and landscape / portrait orientation changes.
● Fixed a possible app crash if you press the “Start Reading” button on the book info page.
● Fixed bookmarks sometimes disappearing when running on iOS 8.0.
● Fixed the bookmarks and annotations study tools view changing randomly after startup to a different book.
● Fixed a crash when launching the application for the first time.
● Fixed many other smaller issues.
